Text: Dancing Stage Fusion:  In April of the following year, "Dancing Stage Fusion" was released as an arcade game.

Text: Dancing Stage Fusion:  The arcade version of Fusion was the first arcade machine in Europe since "Dancing Stage EuroMix 2" and set a milestone as the first "Dance Dance Revolution" arcade machine produced by Konami since "Dance Dance Revolution Extreme" in 2002.
